The Role As a Lumen Program Manager, you will collaborate with project team members, stakeholders, customers and sponsors to identify and monitor budget goals, scope, project plan, issues, risks and milestones. Establish measures to determine success of projects (e.g., costs, scope, time, intended results). The Main Responsibilities Manage project team activities, analyze complex business problems to provide appropriate solutions, implement solutions that leverage technology to accomplish stated strategic business objectives. Demonstrate action-oriented leadership when faces with a project roadblock Develop integrated program plans that take into account multiple project deliverables, and proactively indentify critical impediments to meeting project objectives Conduct regular team meetings to enhance teamwork and communicate process and procedure updates Coordinate projects and programs across multiple business groups to ensure timely delivery of objectives.
